member.name: KERB_QUERY_BINDING_CACHE_REQUEST
member.summary: Contains information used to query the binding cache. You must have the SeTcbPrivilege privilege set.

member.name: KERB_QUERY_BINDING_CACHE_REQUEST.MessageType
member.summary: A value of the enumeration that lists the types of messages that can be sent to the Kerberos authentication package by calling the function. This member must be set to KerbQueryBindingCacheMessage.
